name: Empower the Arats
description: The arats, or peasant class, are a massive majority of Mongolia, though they hold next to no power against the nobles and their bosses. They must be given far more rights and must become equal to those nobles who oppressed them before.

name: Redistribute Wealth
description: The noble princes hoarded the wealth and kept it from getting to the people. Now that we can seize their wealth, it should be distributed to the people who have suffered for many years.

name: Re-evaluate Monastery Funding
description: The monasteries gain a large amount of funding from the Urga government. Perhaps their funding should be re-evaluated to see whether it could be ut to better use.

name: Seize Land from Rich Nobles
description: The rich nobles own most of the workable land in Mongolia, making it nearly impossible for the workers to rise up in society. These nobles do not deserve all their land, and so some should be seize to equally distribute it.

name: Remove Power from the Nobility
description: The nobles have oppressed for long enough, and the previous government helped them do it. Laws must be repealed that gave noble princes more rights than the common man.

name: Write the Mongolian Constitution
description: A constitution for our nation will help solidify us as a democratic state, free from oppression. It will also allow us to call for our first election.

name: End Old Institutions
description: Many old Mongolian institutions are ancient bodies created either by the traditional monasteries or the Russian Baron Ungern-Sternberg. These should be ended so that new ones can replace them.

name: Legitimise our Government
description: Many still see our government as weak and illegitimate. A propaganda campaign across the cities of the nation should help solidify our rule.

name: Limited Freedoms
description: For years Mongolians have lived without any freedoms at all. However, giving them total freedom through the law is risky and could promote anti-government activity.

name: Revolutionary Military
description: A new military is necessary, to replace the old oppressive system. A military to protect the democratic revolution at all costs.

name: Defensive Approach
description: Though we must save Mongolians under the evil fist of the Chinese, our military should also protect those people after we have saved them. A defensive approach therefore is best.

name: For Democracy!
description: The first committment of the military should be to protect Mongolian democracy. This should be emphasised throughout recruits' training so that they can properly serve.

name: First National Election
description: The first national election has been held! And the winner is...

name: KAN Election Victory
description: The Konsyervativ Ardchilsan Nam under Ünenbayan has won the election.

name: Reimburse the Nobles
description: The nobles, though they were in the wrong before, have been thoroughly mistreated in the new democratic administration. They should be reimbursed for money and land they lost.

name: Encourage Outside Investment
description: For the nation to thrive we need investment from foreign businesses. It should be encouraged through tax cuts and grants.

name: Promote Traditional Values
description: Though democracy is a rather revolutionary idea in Mongolia, traditionalism should not be abandoned. It is the cornerstone of society, and should be protected and encouraged.

name: Anti-Socialism
description: The socialist MAN party have gone too far. The people must be taught that socialism does not help them, but squabbles in internal struggles and control the people while running the country into ruin.

name: The Popular Prince
description: Prince Demchugdongrub, though he took part in trying to take over the nation during the Western Revolt, is still very popular in the traditional areas of the nation. Ünenbayan, on the other hand, does not share this popularity. Perhaps it is time for him to step down, and allow Demchugdongrub to take his place.

name: MAN Election Victory
description: The Mongol Ardīn Nam have won the election.

name: Freedom of the Press
description: Now that we have secured a democratic mandate, perhaps it is time to allow a fully free press to operate legally in Mongolia.

name: Equal Opportunity Law
description: Everyone should have equal opportunity in life, and this should be enshrined into law.

name: MAN Self-coup
description: The Mongol Ardīn Nam have taken dictatorial powers.

name: Secure MAN Power
description: We must act if we are to secure our power. Remove other parties from any government positions and crush any remaining rebels.

name: State Press
description: A state press is necessary to teach the people what their government is doing, while being honest about the facts that the state does not do wrong.

name: Enact Welfare
description: With the money seized from the nobles, it is time to start distributing this wealth through welfare to the people.

name: Focus on Urban Peasants
description: The peasants in the cities are the easiest to reach and are the most visibly in trouble. They should be focused on when giving out this welfare.

name: A Free Peoples
description: Mongolia is now full of free people, where democracy rules!

name: Organise the State
description: The state must now be fully organised to be MAN only, to protect the regime and the government.

name: MLN Election Victory
description: The Mongolyn Libyeral Nam under Tseveen have won the election.

name: Freedom For All Mongolians
description: The last regime did not institute proper freedoms for the people of Mongolia. This must be changed, so that all peoples have freedom to do as they wish.

name: Protect Democratic Institutions
description: The democratic institutions of the state are constantly in danger, with both the authoritarian leaning MAN and the princes dominated KAN threatening it. Laws must be put in place to protect them.

name: Help the Poorest
description: The poorest in this nation still struggle to survive. A focused attempt must be made to help them.

name: Mongolian Education Act
description: Our nation will never develop without proper schooling and education. This is necessary if we are to advance as a society and resist falling back into traditionalist ways.

name: A Liberal Nation
description: The nation of Mongolia has been transformed into a liberal and equal society.
